snippet.title: Scribble (Nitrome.com) Levels 1-5: Desert
snippet.description:
First 5 levels of Scribble. This is a game similar to Sandman where you have to guide the blots (those creatures that walk forward until they find a wall) until the finish flag of every level by drawing lines to build bridges, walls, etc.
You can play it for free in: http://www.nitrome.com/games/scribble/?game=scribble#.X4s_zxJxdPY
I hope you like it!
